alert.note: Alert for Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 2:59AM PDT until June 18 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PDT/MST THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PDT/MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County and far Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 8 AM PDT/MST this morning to 9 PM PDT/MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
